the inbetweeners cast , answering your questions right now .
the inbetweeners cast are here , ready to answer your questions .
post your questions for the inbetweeners cast .

documents.title: that 's the end of our chat with the inbetweeners cast !
text: thank you to everyone for submitting questions .
simon , james , blake and joe must head off , but a big thank you to them for coming in to answer your questions .
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 3:05pm that 's it you lot .
thanks for your questions .
elpero asks : james ( or any of you really ) : are there any hot new indie artists/bands i should be checking out ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:59pm james : my faves at the moment are the milk , and states of emotion .
foom asks : which one of you is most likely to be brutally murdered in a game of thrones cameo appearance ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:57pm blake : i hope it 's me .
but only if the other three kill me .
penelope123 says : i just love friday night dinner , as well as chickens .
will there be any more series of these made ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:56pm penelope123 is clearly a woman of exquisite taste .
for those of you who do n't know , chickens was a critically maligned and commercially unsuccessful comedy series that joe and i wrote .
blake : it does sound terrible .

harrison asks : who of you will be taking the will smith route into unfussy sci fi blockbusters , and who will be taking the shirley temple route of stardom in youth , obsolescence for the rest of your long life ?
which prompted kumano to say : shirley temple was the us ambassador to both ghana and czechoslovakia i 'll have you know !
and sezame : how dare you !
sacrilege !
shirley temple is an icon !
you know nothing , harrison .
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:53pm joe : we 're just going to let this one run its course
id8870775 wants to know : why do n't any of you age ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:50pm blake : we 're cryogenically frozen between films .
dsteinerish asks : if your characters were female who would you like to play them ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:49pm james : i reckon i could still do it.simon : lupita nyong'o.joe : charlotte ritchie.blake : elle macpherson - we 're both tens .
ryan masad asks : if you could say 5 words to kim jong un , what would they be ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:47pm simon : the inbetweeners 2 opens tomorrow .
corrinwoollcott continues the love-in : before you go and see rebecca jennings on the 1st floor by the kitchen , im already on the 2nd , so come and see me first by the soft seating .
< 3 < 3 guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:46pm blake : are those hearts , or pointy penises ?
happydaysinhell wants to know : punching a fish - as funny to film as it was to watch ?
neil 's look of regret was priceless .
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:44pm blake : no , it was freezing .
and a fish 's head is harder than you think ( swollen knuckles ) .james : and the fish kept screaming : why ?
and then we took its pension , and flung it in a phone box .
his big bruised face was the cover of the sun the next day , and we were eventually caught by cctv footage .
we only got 24 hours of community service , and there was an outrage .
borisearth says : we 've seen the simpsons & family guy crossover .
which comedy would inbetweeners choose to crossover with ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:41pm simon : last of the summer wine.joe : and chickens , which was a sort of crossover.simon : available now on dvd .
criminally underrated.james : is it available on dvd ?
thejollyroger asks a very inbetweeners question : do i need to bring my wellies if i 'm going to be knee deep in klunge ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:40pm simon : you 'll need waders this time round .
callumde wants to know : if could perform a wrestling move on one historical figure , what & who would it be ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:39pm james : [ instantly ] walls of jericho on winston churchill .
or the swanton bomb on margaret thatcher .
rebecca jennings asks : will you come and visit me at my desk ?
1st floor by the kitchen .
< 3 guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:38pm simon : see you in a mo .
misovlogos asks : when is it acceptable to use sexist , homophobic or otherwise problematic language in the service of comedy ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:37pm simon : when you 're obviously playing a character.blake : when the comedy comes from the ignorance of the people using it .
mbison22 asks : why does james buckley have the euro currency symbol tattooed on his wrist ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:35pm james : it 's the symbol of epiphone guitars.simon : he had to get one to cover up his drachma tattoo .
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:36pm joe : i might get the kenyan schilling .
keep it old school .
hoppo wants to know : which is your favourite minor character from the series ( anyone outside yourselves and mr gilbert ) ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:34pm joe : patrice , the french exchange student , played by the beautiful vladimir consigny .
his mum is in the diving bell and the butterfly , and he told me about satre .
good guy.simon : paedo kennedy .
joe : we want a spinoff series between paedo kennedy and mr gilbert called no now , john.james : i 'd go with miles .
one for the purists.blake : neil 's dad.simon : even though he 's not his real dad .
iain macaskill asks : will there be more crap dancing in the new film ?

guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:31pm james : there was n't any crap dancing in the first.simon : point of information - blake got a b in gcse dance.blake : struggled with the written .
spiderbeak asks : if you were to be punished by being sent to medievel england but allowed to take one weapon , what would you take ?
i 'd take a tazer ( with plenty of batteries ) .
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:30pm james : just a gun would be fine .
or a tank.joe : a submarine.simon : my fists , these babies can do some damage.blake : a small lighter , and i 'd convince them i was a flame-wielding magician .
vanillasky99 asks : who has the fittest mum in real life ? !
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:28pm blake , james , simon : all votes for mrs thomas .
congratulations mrs thomas.joe : congratulations mr thomas .

documents.title: the inbetweeners cast , answering your questions right now
text: fwends : the inbetweeners in the guardian building photograph : /ben beaumont-thomas , the guardian
chriswareham asks : why was the fake vomit so much more realistic looking in the tv series compared to the film ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:26pm joe : we do n't think it was more realistic on the tv .
we do n't want to point fingers , but simon bird did request better-tasting fake vomit in the film .
in the tv series it was cold vegetable soup ; in the film it was a kind of fruit smoothie .
you do the math .
emma bowman asks the age old question : would you rather fight 100 horse size ducks or 100 duck size horses ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:24pm blake : no brainer .
100 duck sized horses .
i think this question is usually more difficult .
vammyp asks : if you awoke one morning to find your feet replaced at the ankles by single office chair wheels how would you react ?
how would this alter the course of your day ?

guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:23pm james : i 'd be quite upset.blake : you 'd money on hiring skates at rollerdiscos.joe : i 'd have to stop going bowling , but then again my segway hire costs would come down .
ashf wants to know : do you think louis van gaal will be daunted by the legacy of fergie ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:21pm simon : no , he 's an ice-cold motherfucker .
goldenfrost has a few questions : q1 .
simon , are you single ? q2 .
who are your favourite comedians ? q3 .
what are each of your favourite scenes in the inbetweeners ? q4 .
what are your career aspirations ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:19pm simon : this one 's going to be quite info-heavy .
all:1 : no.2 : milligan , cleese , everett , sessions.3 : puke on boy , wank on old person , shit in pants , piss the bed.4 : keep on keepin ' on .
jbgrenouille asks : is the inbetweeners still something you still enjoy being a part of ?
or do you find yourselves feeling like you 've outgrown the roles/characters ?
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:17pm joe : we do feel quite at home in this show .
when we get back together , there 's quite a lot of infant regression going on .
so maybe we have n't outgrown it , but we should have .
mbison22 wants to know : you 're in a lifeboat that can only hold one more person .
who do you pluck from the sea to save : iain morris or damon beesley ?

guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:14pm simon : has to be damon.james : if by some sort of miracle iain did n't sink the boat , he would definitely devour any sort of provisions immediately.simon : iain 's nickname is podge , because he once put on a bit of weight .

documents.title: the inbetweeners cast are here , ready to answer your questions
text: simon bird , james buckley , blake harrison and joe thomas aka : will , jay , neil and simon are in the guardian building to answer your questions about the inbetweeners 2 , which follows the lads 's misadventures on an australian gap year .
guardian contributor theinbetweeners2 05 august 2014 2:11pm we 're here !
starting shortly .
so , what are you going to ask them ?

documents.title: post your questions for the inbetweeners cast
text: since it first hit tv screens in 2008 , the inbetweeners has become a beloved british comedy thanks to its quartet of clueless and mostly virginal suburban lads .

their travails were as muscle-spasmingly embarrassing as they were familiar , from driving crap cars and failing to chirpse girls to masturbating in an old people 's home ( ok , we never did that last one ) .
even their influence on our lexicon has been profound , with clunge , briefcase wanker and fwend !
all still happily chanted .
their success cleared the way for a film in 2011 , in which their hapless exploits were transplanted intact to the med and it was a massive success , grossing over â£ 50m worldwide .
so here comes a sequel , with the boys heading to australia for gap year misadventures .

to mark the film coming out on 6 august , we 've got all four of the main cast simon bird , james buckley , blake harrison and joe thomas coming in to answer your questions about the series , the films , and anything else about their respective careers .
it 'll take place on tuesday 5 august from 2.15pm bst onwards so post your questions now and they 'll endeavour to answer as many as possible .

bulletin.text: TV's favourite schoolboys came in to answer your questions, revealing what wrestling move they'd use on Thatcher, who has the fittest mum and the difficulties of punching a fish.
